My name is Marty.
I enjoy helping people & keeping things simple.

About Me

I am a experienced web developer that works for a mid-sized government. I help make our websites, applications and user interfaces better. When not in the office, I enjoy working on websites for small businesses & organizations and improving my programming skills.

In my free time, I enjoy playing pretty much anything and hanging out with family, friends and my dogs. I'm always happy when I stumble into a good meal with lots of meat, a potato and an adult beverage or two.
